organic carbon is depleted. Barriers to implementation include regional capacity for monitoring and
verification (especially in developing countries), and more widely through concerns over saturation and
benefits, risks and implementation opportunities and barriers.

fed to ruminants (Section 7.4.3.4). Barriers to upscaling include insufficient investment, limited large
